item.content:encoded:
February’s guest mix, this month local legend Aaron Cook takes to the decks for us, with a Touch Prog & Electro House mix.

In his short but sharp rise in his Djing career Aaron is going from strength to strength! Building a good reputation for his tight flawless mixing and excellent knowlege and selection of tunes, he definately knows how to read what the crowd wants.

After winning the Crash Manor Dj Competition in February last year year he then went on to become a weekly resident there playing progressive and tech trance for the night Crash @ Crash Manor which hosted many big name DJs including Guiseppe Ottaviani, Simon Patterson, Sean Tyas, Richard Durand and many more!.

Unfortunately the night shut down due to change in music policy but since then he has begun to play regular all over the south west. Aaron has also had recent regular gigs playing in the 103 bar and the Baby Box rooms of the world famous Ministry of Sound and two recent gigs at the 02 Academy Brixton, both based in London While playing there he has played on the same lineups as big names like Worlds Number 1 Armin Van Buuren, Eddie Halliwell, Jochen Miller, Seb Fontaine, Fabio, Jordan Suckley. Markus Schulz, Andy Moor, Above and Beyond, Mauro Picotto, Mat Zo, Daniel Portman, Jaytech, Stefano Noferini and many more!

2011 has been a great year so far, wilth Aaron playing again at Ministry of Sound and the 02 Academy Brixton for Armin Van Buurens tour, he also has played twice in Ibiza this year, playing for popular scottish brand Rectify and also Vicky Devines night Ultraviolet.

Music is his PASSION! Enjoy…. Its awesome xXx

Aaron’s Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/AaronCookDJ?sk=info

Aaron’s Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/aaroncook

1. MatZo - Bipolar 2. Starkillers + Nadia Ali - Keep it Coming 3. Moguai - MPire 4. Marco V vs. Candi Staton - You’ve Got The Reaver (Eddie Thoneick Bootleg) 5. Funkagenda - Shinjuku (Michael Woods Remix) 6. Sia & Armand Van Helden - The Girl You Lost To Cocaine (The Structure Bootleg) 7. Daft Punk - Aerodynamic (Nicky Romero Bootleg) 8. Beat Service feat Neev Kennedy- But I Did (Space Rockerz vs Daniel Heatcliff Remix) 9. Nicky Romero - Toulouse 10. Ostbahnhof and Ugo Platana - Evensong (Michael Woods Remx) 11. Sander van Doorn and Laidback Luke - Whos Wearing the Cap

item.title: FranetiC - Communication - Episode 46 ( House | Trance )
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description: I really didn’t expect to have an episode ready for this week due to the massive amount of uni work I have on. But I thought what better escape from essays then to record a mix! A journey from House to Trance, ending up with some of the driving uplifting stuff at the end Some utterly gorgeous tunes on this weeks episode, including an exclusive bootleg remix by Lisaya of Lana Del Rey - Video Games, big thank you to him for letting me share such a stunning track! Plus a track I was introduced to by a fellow girl DJ, Kate Remington (Orkidea - Unity - Solarstone Pure Mix) She will also be Aprils’ guest DJ! Next week’s guest mix is by South West local legend Aaron Cook, followed by the lovely Inspiros in March! Really fun episode to record as always! I hope u enjoy it as much [...]
item.content:encoded:
I really didn’t expect to have an episode ready for this week due to the massive amount of uni work I have on. But I thought what better escape from essays then to record a mix! A journey from House to Trance, ending up with some of the driving uplifting stuff at the end Some utterly gorgeous tunes on this weeks episode, including an exclusive bootleg remix by Lisaya of Lana Del Rey - Video Games, big thank you to him for letting me share such a stunning track! Plus a track I was introduced to by a fellow girl DJ, Kate Remington (Orkidea - Unity - Solarstone Pure Mix) She will also be Aprils’ guest DJ! Next week’s guest mix is by South West local legend Aaron Cook, followed by the lovely Inspiros in March! Really fun episode to record as always! I hope u enjoy it as much as I did making it.

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - The Dark Road - Episode 45 ( Trance | Tech Trance | Tech Dance | Hard Trance )
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
In complete oppositon to last weeks episode, this is a trip in to Darkness. This mix starts on the lighter proggy/uplifting side, but takes a FranetiC style flip in to the harder side of Trance. Some downright stunners and outright stormers in this mix! A journey from 130BPM to 141BPM Some awesome re-works of classic tracks mixed in the with some absolutely wicked new material! The Cafe Del Mar remix being one of my favourites this week!…. The drop is utter FILTH!

xXx

1) Stu-Con - Falling Moon (Original Mix) 2) Mike Foyle & Refeel - Universal Language (Ben Gold Remix) 3) Ronnie Play & Fabio XB - Moozik (Original Mix) 4) The Madison - Tonight (Original Mix) 5) Ascension - Someone (Signum Vocal Mix) 6) Sky 9 - Fully Charged (Original Mix) 7) John Merki - Second C [...]

item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Welcome to episode 44, the Light….A journey from Progressive to Driving Uplifting Trance. Some stunning tracks within this episode, loving Ben Gold’s version of Tokyo, as well as a couple of excellent promo tracks I got sent this week which are Rubik and Smackdown! Future gems for sure….. Some blissful breaks all in there for you to discover….

Enjoy xXx

item.title: FranetiC - The Present - Episode 42 ( Trance )
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
This is the Christmas Day Mix! Trance from beginning to end! Some beautiful and uplifting sounds to end your Christmas Day. A Franetic style journey from slower to faster. Digital Self Vs Tektonic featuring a couple of times in this mix with a track of their own and an awesome remix of Nick The Kid’s Enigma, as well as a couple of classics chucked in for good measure and an absolute storming track to finish…. Venom Presents Kasuma - Witness…. Released 7 years ago, and never used on my podcasts, I thought it was defo worth a play!

Merry Christmas everyone!

xXx

Tracklisting:

1) Armin Van Buuren Feat. Fiora - Breathe In Deep (Blizzard Remix) 2) Sied Van R [...]

item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Well over due on my podcast now for this style of music! Uplifting and Vocal House to Breaks, stopping off with a mish mash of Filthy Electro, Dirty Fidget and the wonkiest of Wobble along the way. Keep your ears peeled aswell for an extremely cheeky remix of Spice Girls - Wannabe…. Its actually phat! Beginning with a few completely recognisable and utterly legendary house tracks re worked for 2011, working all the way up to the most stupendusley good breaks track at the end!

http://www.facebook.com/franetic

Enjoy

xXx

Rob Tissera 10) The Sound - James K 11) R U High - Toryn D Hi Freak1c

item.title: Tektonic B2B FranetiC - Hindsight ISLAND OF TRANCE REUNION Live Recording - Episode 38
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Special mix for you this week guys, I played out for the Island Of Trance Reunion in Exeter last weekend for Hindsight, with a good friend of mine DJ Tektonic…. Everyone who came on the Island of Trance holiday to Ibiza in September all back under one roof…. got to say, really was one of my favourite sets to date, played out to a packed club and loved every second of it! 21 DJ’s accross 2 floors fair to say we all fuckin smashed it! Awesome Night!

Anyways…

item.title: FranetiC - UK Hard Trance Classics - Episode 37
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Seem to have a slight theme running here with all the classics, but they are always worth a re run, especially these. All my previous Hard Dance podcasts have mainly focused on the European sound, this one is sticking strictly to the UK hard Trance sound with its roots based mainly in Hard House. Bit of a focus on the Riot Brothers in this mix, in my opinion they produced some of the best tracks of this Genre so thought I would overdose on them slightly for this podcast!!

http://www.facebook.com/franetic

Enjoy xXx

Tracklisting:

item.title: FranetiC - A Brief History Of Trance 1993 to 2011 - Episode 36
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Of course Trance goes back to the Acid House era in its earliest forms, being heard from about the mid eighties. But the sound really came to fruition in my opinion when Paul Van Dyk released his remix of Humate - Love Stimulation in 1993, definitely the pioneer of the current sound, bringing the european sound completely to the forefront of the trance scene. I have recorded a mix in complete chronological order, with one track selected from each year since 1993 up to the present day. All my own personal preferences and aren’t necessarily actual number one tracks from each year, although most of course are recognised and were hits in the scene in various forms over the years. And the cover of course drawing a little inspiration from Stephen Hawkings book, a Brief History of Time…..

Enjoy the history
item.content:encoded:
Of course Trance goes back to the Acid House era in its earliest forms, being heard from about the mid eighties. But the sound really came to fruition in my opinion when Paul Van Dyk released his remix of Humate - Love Stimulation in 1993, definitely the pioneer of the current sound, bringing the european sound completely to the forefront of the trance scene. I have recorded a mix in complete chronological order, with one track selected from each year since 1993 up to the present day. All my own personal preferences and aren’t necessarily actual number one tracks from each year, although most of course are recognised and were hits in the scene in various forms over the years. And the cover of course drawing a little inspiration from Stephen Hawkings book, a Brief History of Time…..

Enjoy the history xXx

1) Humate – Love stimulation (Paul Van Dyk Mix) (1993) 2) Paul Van Dyk – For an Angel (Original Mix) (1994) 3) Libra Presents Taylor - Calling Your Name (Granny Mix) (1995) 4) Nalin and Kane – Beachball (Original Extended Vocal Mix) (1996) 5) Three Drives - Greece 2000 (Original Mix) (1997) 6) Binary Finary - Binary Finary (Pvd Mix) (1998) 7) Solar Stone – Seven Cities (Original Mix) (1999) 8) Lange Feat. The Morrighan – Follow Me (Original Mix) (2000) 9) DJ Tiesto – Suburban Train (Radio Edit Mix) (2001) 10) Paul Oakenfold – Southern Sun (Tiesto mix) (2002) 11) Motorcycle - As The rush comes (Above and Beyond’s Dynaglide Mix (2003) 12) Agnelli and Nelson – Holding on to Nothing (Original Mix) (2004) 13) Reflekt - Need To Feel Loved (Thrillseekers Mix) (2005) 14) Armin Van Buuren – Shivers (Alex M.O.R.P.H Remix) (2006) 15) Thomas Bronzwaer – Constellation (Original Mix) (2007) 16) Simon Patterson - Us (Original Mix) (2008) 17) Gareth Emery – Exposure (Original Mix) (2009) 18) Myon and Shane 54 feat. Labworks - Ibiza Sunrise (Classic Mix) (2010) 19) Spaio & Sleazy Tek feat. Susie Ledge - Your only one (Carl Fath Remix) (2011)

item.description:
Hi Guys,

This time round I have got an exclusive guest mix from a friend of mine DJ Tektonic & Trance Technology. An up and coming producer, this guys has been doing the rounds for 10+ years on the Trance scene in the Southwest UK, Having played accross the Nation and Ibiza. Some absolute stormers on this mix, including a selection of his own collaborations with Digital Self. Check out his own podcast at http://ttechnolgy.podomatic.com keep up to date with his own antics! You will be hearing from me Franetic in the 1st week of October…. Until then xXx

As it says in the name 'SOL' a mix purely inspired by the Sun. A mish mash of Progressive House Trance sounds from the last 2 years, molded into one hour long mix for your listening pleasure. I am off travelling for a Month from Sunday, so no more mixes until October from me..... you'll be hearing from me in the Autumn..... :)
Love FranetiC xXx
Tracklisting:
1) Micheal Cassette - Crocketts Theme 2) Teensnake - Coma Cat (Roundtable Knights Mix) 3) Kings Of Tomorrow - Finally (East and Young Mix) 4) Roger Sanchez - 2gether (Do it Yourself) Alex Armes Scott Anselmo Remix 5) System F - Out Of The Blue 2010 (Simon Gain Remix) 6) Daniel Portman EDX - Darkside (Daniel Portman Club Mix) 7) DjM Agebeat - Greece 2010 8) Donatello - Magic Secrets (Original Mix) 9) Fatboy Slim vs Thomas Gold - Star 69 (Thomas Gold 2010 Remix) 10) Sandy Riveria Rae - Hide U (Norman Rae Mix) 11) Funkagenda - Astana (Orginal Mix) 12) Michael Woods - Dynamik (Original Mix) 13) Nik Denton - Freaks Dont Sleep (Original Mix)
xXx

Happy Listening

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Ibiza Calling - Episode 30
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Trance well and truly back in picture this week. I thought as I am OFFICIALLY booked to play in Ibiza at various bars and clubs from the 3rd Sept to 9th Sept for Hindsight @ Island of Trance, I would create a mix with some proper White Isle Trance vibes! Starting off with some amazing vocal tracks, progressing through in to some techier Trance towards the end. If you fancy joining me on this epic week then visit this facebook page for booking info http://www.facebook.com/#!/event.php?eid=114500298636265

£269 for 7 nights all inclusive clubbing package!! VIP entry included in to Judgement Sundays, Armin Van buren @ Space and Cream at Amnesia, aswell as all the usual EPIC hindsight parties.

This mix is totally all about the massive names mixed with the lesser known, all totally on top form for the (apparent) summer!!

Tracklisting:-

1) Andain - Pr [...]

Trance well and truly back in picture this week. I thought as I am OFFICIALLY booked to play in Ibiza at various bars and clubs from the 3rd Sept to 9th Sept for Hindsight @ Island of Trance, I would create a mix with some proper White Isle Trance vibes! Starting off with some amazing vocal tracks, progressing through in to some techier Trance towards the end. If you fancy joining me on this epic week then visit this facebook page for booking info http://www.facebook.com/#!/event.php?eid=114500298636265

£269 for 7 nights all inclusive clubbing package!! VIP entry included in to Judgement Sundays, Armin Van buren @ Space and Cream at Amnesia, aswell as all the usual EPIC hindsight parties.

This mix is totally all about the massive names mixed with the lesser known, all totally on top form for the (apparent) summer!!

Tracklisting:-

1) Andain - Promises (Myon & Shane 54 Summer of Love Mix) 2) Laidback Luke Feat. Jonathan Mendelsohn - Till Tonight (Ferry Corsten Fix) 3) Protoculture Feat. Shannon Hurley - Sun Gone Down (Alex M.O.R.P.H & Chris Ortega Mix) 4) Mars Being & Egorythm Feat. Manon Polare - Daywalker (Original Mix) 5) Alex Kunnari - Lost (Original Mix) 6) Niklas Harding & Maxim Yurin - Pulsar (Dart Rayne & Yura Moonlight Mix) 7) Lisa Lashes - Numero Uno (Ummet Ozcan Remix) 8) Sander Van Doorn - Daddyrock (Arty Remix) 9) Mark Sherry - Phantasmic (Original Mix) 10) T4L - Mediterraneo (Original Mix) 11) QBass - Fatal Dirt (Original Mix) 12) Tom Lavin & Adrohan - Tackleberry (Original Mix)

Enjoy the mix

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - GLAM - Episode 29 ( Electro House )
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Welcome to episode 29, This week we are taking a delve back in to the sound that is Electro, bit of everything on this mix, All the shades of Electro from Dirty to Disco to Swing to Chart & even TV remixes! A complete mish mash and hopefully something for everyone. Keep your ears peeled for the remix of the 90’s kids TV programme (That I used to watch!) ‘Round The Twist’ Theme tune! Phat!!!

Trance will return next time

Enjoy

Tracklisting:

1) Now In Stereo – Something For Now (Original Mix) – Freakz Me Out Records 2) Mike Balance – Energy (Original Mix) – Burn The Fire Records 3) Sesto Sento – What Are You Waiting For (Chris Luvly Remix) – [...]

Welcome to episode 29, This week we are taking a delve back in to the sound that is Electro, bit of everything on this mix, All the shades of Electro from Dirty to Disco to Swing to Chart & even TV remixes! A complete mish mash and hopefully something for everyone. Keep your ears peeled for the remix of the 90’s kids TV programme (That I used to watch!) ‘Round The Twist’ Theme tune! Phat!!!

item.title: FranetiC - URBEX - Episode 28
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description: Named after a little hobby of mine, this weeks podcast is URBEX!A real mish mash for this episode….. Starting off pretty gently with some proggy/uplifting Trance and winding up to some harder edged Trance.Loads of promo tracks on this podcast including one co-produced by a friend of mine Tek-tonic alongside bit of a local legend Digital Self (LogOne). The track is called Extron and is rammed full of White Isle vibes, with the season beginning in Ibiza its definetly got the makings of an anthem! Also lovin the Loki remix of Judgement by southwest duo Future:Impact & Scott atrill’s take on Signum - What you got for me!!Enjoy Tracklisting1) Sherano G - 4 Times (Original Mix) - Expand Digital2) Digital Self & Tek-tonic - Extron (Original mix) - Hindsight Ibiza Series3) Mich [...]

item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description: NOT FOR THE FAINT HEARTED!!!This is my Birthday mix!! and I thought theres nothing better than to do a mix which I have promised a lot of people for a really long time to celebrate getting another year older!So this mix is a collection of some of my favourite HARD TRANCE & HARDSTYLE CLASSICS! all tunes I absolutly loved back in the day and still do! most are between 2002 to 2006 when most of my raving to this style of music was done sort of a follow-on from my Dance Academy classics mix…. so if you liked that….. you will definetly be in to this!!!Trance shall return from next week Tracklisting: (The [...]
item.content:encoded: NOT FOR THE FAINT HEARTED!!!This is my Birthday mix!! and I thought theres nothing better than to do a mix which I have promised a lot of people for a really long time to celebrate getting another year older!So this mix is a collection of some of my favourite HARD TRANCE & HARDSTYLE CLASSICS! all tunes I absolutly loved back in the day and still do! most are between 2002 to 2006 when most of my raving to this style of music was done sort of a follow-on from my Dance Academy classics mix…. so if you liked that….. you will definetly be in to this!!!Trance shall return from next week Tracklisting: (The harder styles of music always seem to have the best names lol!)1) Yakooza - Cocaine (Wag Remix)2) Marc Dawn - Expander (Flutlicht Remix)3) Pacific Link - Planetary Collapse (Luca Antolini Mix)4) Dave Joy - Third Pleasure (Uberdruck Remix)5) Uberdruck presents DRUGFACE - Fill me with Drugs & Then Fuck me for Hours (DJ The Crow Mix)6) Tuneboy - Housenation (Screamin’ Bitch Mix)7) Julian DJ & Davide Sonar - Techno Noise (Original Frequency Mix)8) Crash Bass - Hardshake (Original Mix)9) Stylez meets Tonteufel - Abwehrton (Original Mix)10) Miss Kitty - Party People (Original Mix)11) Logger & Gnetic - One night in Wantage (Original Mix)xXx

I’ve got some amazing uplifting trance to begin with, taking a darker turn towards the end.Hours of sifting through hundreds of tracks this week, really gotta hunt for the diamonds in the rough atm!! these are my all my personal favourites released within the last month or so.Totally in love with Space by A.R.D.I, complete and utter blissful breakdown Also loving White and Red by Peter Sawland and the beasty remix of RAMazing! Hope you enjoy and until next time Tracklisting:1) Temple One - Zebra (Nuera Remix)2) Abstract Vision & Elite Electronic - Echo [...]
item.content:encoded: Hi guys, This is podcast number 25 ‘Lunar’. I’ve got some amazing uplifting trance to begin with, taking a darker turn towards the end.Hours of sifting through hundreds of tracks this week, really gotta hunt for the diamonds in the rough atm!! these are my all my personal favourites released within the last month or so.Totally in love with Space by A.R.D.I, complete and utter blissful breakdown Also loving White and Red by Peter Sawland and the beasty remix of RAMazing! item.title: FranetiC - Filthy Animal ROUND 2! Episode 22 ( House / Electro / Fidget Mix )
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description: Hi Guys,Sorry its been a while since my last mix! nearly 3 weeks! just finished all my major uni work for this term, so i promise i shall be more on it over easter! Well im back with a House/Electro/Fidget Mix which is a massive change of late from my usual outputtings of Trance, Its a promo mix for FILTHY ANIMAL which I am the co promoter for, we do nights in the South West UK playing all the best House/Electro/DnB/Filth!!I love to vary every now and again, and I hope you feel the vibe of this mix Will do a Trance mix for next week so keep your eyes peeled xXx

item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Welcome to this, my 2nd podcast of 2011 104mins of solid TRANCE! For the life of me I actually could not think of anything to call this one, so two random things popped into my head, this is the outcome….. Something a little different to begin, im feelin the progressive vibe at the moment, so starting off with that heading into some amazing and truly beautiful uplifting trance, getting a tiny bit techy at the end, although really nothing heavy atall this week, keepin it melodic

Enjoys

1) Gerry Cueto - Route 99 (Chris Cortez Remix) 2) Fabio XB - Reflected (XB Club Rework) 3) Mike Foyle pres. Stati [...]
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to this, my 2nd podcast of 2011 104mins of solid TRANCE! For the life of me I actually could not think of anything to call this one, so two random things popped into my head, this is the outcome….. Something a little different to begin, im feelin the progressive vibe at the moment, so starting off with that heading into some amazing and truly beautiful uplifting trance, getting a tiny bit techy at the end, although really nothing heavy atall this week, keepin it melodic

Enjoys

1) Gerry Cueto - Route 99 (Chris Cortez Remix) 2) Fabio XB - Reflected (XB Club Rework) 3) Mike Foyle pres. Statica - Head Rush (Original Mix) 4) Zachary Zamarripa - Sassafras (Original Mix) 5) Jochen Miller - Humanoid (Ali Wilson Remix) 6) Darren Tate - Field Of Dreams (Original Mix) 7) Myon Shane 54 - International Departures (Classic Anthem Mix) 8) Lange - Sci-Fi Hero (Extended Mix) 9) Susana Bart Claessen - If I Could (Dan Stone Remix) 10) Solid Globe - North Pole (Giuseppe Ottaviani Remix) 11) Inge Lemon - Starchild (Original Mix) 12) Stuart Donaghy feat Sam Bowles - Cirrus (Original Mix) 13) August Vila - Midnight (Manuel Le Saux Remix) 14) Rodrigo Deem - Miss You Friend (Original Mix) 15) Dave202 - Coming Home - (Paul Webster Remix) 16) Robbie Nelson - Up In Smoke (Indecent Noise Remix) 17) Kris Day - From Beneath (Stuart Trainer Remix) 18) Mallorca Lee & Sam Starr - Netwerk (Original Mix)

xXx

item.description:
Episode 18 - Trance Monster, a 90 minute mix for you, some amazing uplifting stuff in this one, finishing off a bit on the techy side. This will be my last mix for couple of weeks now, back on to the fortnightly episodes now as I am going back to uni at the weekend. A good old Trance mix to ease you into 2011.

Happy New Year Guys

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - The Selection TwentyTen - Episode 17
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
The Final episode of the year!! A massive 2 hour MEGA mix!!! pure and utter TRANCE!! Ive had a brill 2010, heres hoping 2011 can beat it!! My final podcast is a mix of all my favourite tracks of 2010 with a cheeky classic at the beginning which is by System F and Armin Van Buuren ‘Exhale’ which was realeased at the beginning of this current decade!

hope u all enjoy and i hope u all have a wonderful new year

Tracklisting:

1) System F featuring Armin Van Buuren - Exhale (Original Mix) 2) Jonas Stenburg - Nightfall (Original Mix) 3) Mark Pledger - Time Stands Still (Andy Duguid Remix) 4) Nathan Profit - Strange Days (Manuel Le Saux Remix) 5) Rozza - London to Bangkok ( [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Final episode of the year!! A massive 2 hour MEGA mix!!! pure and utter TRANCE!! Ive had a brill 2010, heres hoping 2011 can beat it!! My final podcast is a mix of all my favourite tracks of 2010 with a cheeky classic at the beginning which is by System F and Armin Van Buuren ‘Exhale’ which was realeased at the beginning of this current decade!

hope u all enjoy and i hope u all have a wonderful new year

Tracklisting:

1) System F featuring Armin Van Buuren - Exhale (Original Mix) 2) Jonas Stenburg - Nightfall (Original Mix) 3) Mark Pledger - Time Stands Still (Andy Duguid Remix) 4) Nathan Profit - Strange Days (Manuel Le Saux Remix) 5) Rozza - London to Bangkok (Haris C RE-Rub) 6) Myon Shane 54 feat. Labworks - Ibiza Sunrise (Classic Mix) 7) Jan Johnston meets Tenishia - Flesh (Glenn Morrison Remix) 8) Breakfast - Remember (Original Mix) 9) Lange & Andy Moor - Stadium Four (Original Mix) 10) Armin Van Buuren Feat. Cathy Burton - Rain (Cosmic Gate Remix) 11) Taylor & Close vs. John O’Callaghan feat. Audrey Gallagher - Take Cafe Del Mar Away (Andre’Smash) 12) Team SR - Leaving London (Mac and Taylor Remix) 13) Sean Tyas - I Remember Now (Sied van Riel Remix) 14) Ilya Soloviev - Echo (Bryan Kearney Remix) 15) Sied van Riel & Radion 6 - Radiator (Original Mix) 16) Steve Ewens - Global Resistance (Original Mix) 17) Tristan D - 2012 (Original Mix) 18) Mallorca Lee - Medication Vacation (Indecent Noise’s Swift Kick In The Nuts Remix) 19) Shu - Audio Intimidation (Original Mix) 20) Riccocha - Devine (Sadowick Remix) 21) LogOne - Celexa (Original Mix) 22) Vinylgroover The Red Hed - Everlasting (Scott Attrill’s Hard Electrik Mix)

xXxXx

item.title: FranetiC - Dance Academy Classics ( Hard Trance / Hard House / Hardstyle 2002 to 2006 ) - Episode 16
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description: Episode 16 for you now, Ive decided to dedicate this weeks mix to one of my all time favourite clubs that I used to go to from 2002 to 2006 when it closed down, The Dance Academy in plymouth was running as I knew it for about 15 years, all the classics I have in my mix are from the years when I attended (2002 to 2006) a mix of Hard Trance, Hard House and Hardstyle, a real mix of all my own personal favourite Academy tracks that got me up stomping about in that amazing place…..Incase you dont know what dance academy was, It was one of the best night clubs I have ever been too, it was in a converted Victorian Theatre in Plymouth, Devon. I used to go to the Saturday night event which was known as Eyecon, Playing Trance & Hard Dance, seeing some of the best names in the Dance music scene, from Scott Project, to UberDruck, to Dave Pearce and everything inbetween.It shu [...]
item.content:encoded: Episode 16 for you now, Ive decided to dedicate this weeks mix to one of my all time favourite clubs that I used to go to from 2002 to 2006 when it closed down, The Dance Academy in plymouth was running as I knew it for about 15 years, all the classics I have in my mix are from the years when I attended (2002 to 2006) a mix of Hard Trance, Hard House and Hardstyle, a real mix of all my own personal favourite Academy tracks that got me up stomping about in that amazing place…..Incase you dont know what dance academy was, It was one of the best night clubs I have ever been too, it was in a converted Victorian Theatre in Plymouth, Devon. I used to go to the Saturday night event which was known as Eyecon, Playing Trance & Hard Dance, seeing some of the best names in the Dance music scene, from Scott Project, to UberDruck, to Dave Pearce and everything inbetween.It shut down in 2006 after a raid, the building is still there, although sadly remains derilict.Tracklisting:1) Nalin & Kane Vs Denis The Menace - Cruising (Steve Murano Mix)2) Dark Monks - Insane (Steve Murano Vocal Remix)3) Heavens Cry - Till Tears Do us part (Flash Harry Remix)4) Miss Behavin’ - Such A Good Feelin’ (Lee Haslam Vs Guyver Remix)5) Riot Bros - Ripped out (Original Mix)6) Meteor 7 - Universal Music (Scott Project Remix)7) Atlantic Wave - Reforced (Giada Remix)8) Technoboy - Chapter 2 (Original Mix)9) DJ Isaac - The Edge (Original Mix)10) High Voltage - Bombs away (Original Mix)xXx

I used to go to the Saturday night event which was known as Eyecon, Playing Trance Hard Dance, seeing some of the best names in the Dance music scene, from Scott Project, to UberDruck, to Dave Pearce and everything inbetween.It shut down in 2006 after a raid, the building is still there, although sadly remains derilict.Tracklisting:1) Nalin Kane Vs Denis The Menace - Cruising (Steve Murano Mix)2) Dark Monks - Insane (Steve Murano Vocal Remix)3) Heavens Cry - Till Tears Do us part (Flash Harry Remix)4) Miss Behavin' - Such A Good Feelin' (Lee Haslam Vs Guyver Remix)5) Riot Bros - Ripped out (Original Mix)6) Meteor 7 - Universal Music (Scott Project Remix)7) Atlantic Wave - Reforced (Giada Remix)8) Technoboy - Chapter 2 (Original Mix)9) DJ Isaac - The Edge (Original Mix)10) High Voltage - Bombs away (Original Mix)xXx

item.content:encoded:
Breaking with tradition of late, instead of every 2 weeks just over christmas I will be going back to weekly podcasts. This week I have so many of these remixes I thought they deserved their own mix…… most are free downloads from ah.fm and offered kindly by the dj’s on their own web pages….. enjoy

1) Its a Fine Day - D.O.N.S Remix 2) Gabriel and Dresden vs Dinka - Tracking Treasure Down Zero Altitude (Ben Double M Mashup) 3) Planet Funk vs Dinka - Green Leaf Chase the Sun (Ben Double M Mashup) 4) Smith and Pleasure feat Carrie Skipper vs Dinka - Civilization Forever (Ben Double M Acapella Mash Up) 5) Take Cafe Del Mar Away - Taylor and Close vs John O’Callaghan feat Audrey Gallagher (Andre’Smash) 6) Exploration of Space - Back 2 - Cosmic Gate 7) 1998 Overwings - Digital Nature & La Saux vs Binary Finary (EDU NRG Mash Up) 8) Ordinary World - Aurora (Jordan Suckley Vocal Remix) 9) Playing with Saturno - David Moleon vs Bizarre Inc (Bryan Kearny SMASH UP) 10) Onedalism - John Askew vs Joint Operations Centre vs Swedish Mafia vs Congrock (Bryan Kearny’s Straight to Hell SMASH UP) 11) Teardrop - Organ Donors

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Guest Mix for Filthy Animal - Episode 13 (Electro & Fidget set)
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Here is episode 13!!! This podcast is all Electro and Fidget House just for a change. Its a mix I have compiled for a Club Night called ‘Filthy Animal’ that runs in Devon/Cornwall UK. Next event is at Mango Tango’s in Falmouth on 3rd December, follow this link >>>>> http://www.facebook.com/#!/event.php?eid=177313838952381 I will be doing an Electro/Fidget set, so if you live in Cornwall, UK, Be there

xXx

1) Disco Heat - Simioli and Black Dance (Original Mix) 2) The Way - Alex Kidd (USA)(Original Mix) 3) String Thing - Danny Nightingale (Original Mix) 4) Exploration Of Space - Cosmic Gate (Spencer and Hill Remix) 5) Animal Rights - Deadmau5 & Wolfgang Gartner (Original Mix) 6) Above the Rim - Sagan (Original Mix) 7) Still that there h [...]
item.content:encoded:
Here is episode 13!!! This podcast is all Electro and Fidget House just for a change. Its a mix I have compiled for a Club Night called ‘Filthy Animal’ that runs in Devon/Cornwall UK. Next event is at Mango Tango’s in Falmouth on 3rd December, follow this link >>>>> http://www.facebook.com/#!/event.php?eid=177313838952381 I will be doing an Electro/Fidget set, so if you live in Cornwall, UK, Be there

xXx

1) Disco Heat - Simioli and Black Dance (Original Mix) 2) The Way - Alex Kidd (USA)(Original Mix) 3) String Thing - Danny Nightingale (Original Mix) 4) Exploration Of Space - Cosmic Gate (Spencer and Hill Remix) 5) Animal Rights - Deadmau5 & Wolfgang Gartner (Original Mix) 6) Above the Rim - Sagan (Original Mix) 7) Still that there hope - David Menezes (Original Mix) 8) Ready to Fuck - Fast Foot (Original Mix) 9) R3000 - Indescreet (Hirshee Remix) 10) Parlez Vouz Francais - Art Vs Science (Lee Mortimer Mix) 11) Moving To The Beat - Liquid Vs Billy Daniel Bunter and Sparky Ft Kyla (Rocket Pimp Remix) 12) Face The Music - Minotaur Kill meets Slipmatt and Rocket Pimp (Slipmatt and Rocket Pimp Electro Remix) 13) SMD - SMD1 (Rocket Pimp and Jack James Remix) 14) Filthy Rehab - Yea! (Original Mix) 15) Gio Hungary - Woop It Up (Mr. Skeleton & B.have Remix)

item.title: FranetiC - Journeys - Episode 12
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Here we are at number 12, recorded live from my Uni halls bedroom, yet again annoying my very close neighbours, but all for the sake of TRANCE!! Some absolutly beautiful tracks in this mix including one of my faves this yr Above and Beyond Pres Oceanlab - On a good day, such an uplifting track with spine tingling vocals, down right GORGEOUS! Enjoy Episode 12……

Tracklisting:

1) Dennis de Laat - Sound Of Violence (Main Mix) Spinning Records 2) The Thrillseekers - Synaesthesia (Alex M.O.R.P.H. Remix) Soundpiercing 3) Marcus Schossow Reeves feat. Emma Hewitt - Light (Stoneface Terminal Vocal Remix) Spinnin’ Bundles 4) Peter Martijn Wijnia - Sacrifices (Original Mix) - Spinnin’ Bundles 5) Above & Beyond + Gareth Emery pres. OceanLab - On A Good Day (Metropolis) - Extended Mix - Anjunabeats 6) Guy Mearns - Quantum (Original Mix) 2 Play [...]
item.content:encoded:
Here we are at number 12, recorded live from my Uni halls bedroom, yet again annoying my very close neighbours, but all for the sake of TRANCE!! Some absolutly beautiful tracks in this mix including one of my faves this yr Above and Beyond Pres Oceanlab - On a good day, such an uplifting track with spine tingling vocals, down right GORGEOUS! Enjoy Episode 12……

Tracklisting:

1) Dennis de Laat - Sound Of Violence (Main Mix) Spinning Records 2) The Thrillseekers - Synaesthesia (Alex M.O.R.P.H. Remix) Soundpiercing 3) Marcus Schossow Reeves feat. Emma Hewitt - Light (Stoneface Terminal Vocal Remix) Spinnin’ Bundles 4) Peter Martijn Wijnia - Sacrifices (Original Mix) - Spinnin’ Bundles 5) Above & Beyond + Gareth Emery pres. OceanLab - On A Good Day (Metropolis) - Extended Mix - Anjunabeats 6) Guy Mearns - Quantum (Original Mix) 2 Play Records 7) Sean Truby - Magnesium (Original Mix) 2 Play Records 8) Sherry Allan Wild - Cold Sweat (Original Mix) - Reset Records (NL) 9) Sascha Dolliver & Sherano G - Raindrops Falling - Expand Digital 10) Mark Young & Derek Jones - Vendetta (Original Mix) Traffic Records 11) Leon B - Endless Rush (Original Mix) Traffic Records 12) Storm - Storm 2010 (Mark Sherry & Dr Willis’s ‘Flashback’ Mix) Allstar Music

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Trancendence - Episode 11
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Welcome to the next FranetiC installment, Recorded live at falmouth uni, on halls annoying my neighbours lol! This podcast starts of easy before delving into some utter techy filth to damage your ear drums with, enjoy the build up…..

1) Nuera Feat Elsa Hill - Driving Me (Original Mix) 2) Moonpax vs Snatt Vix with Xspective Sense - Disco Terra (Artento Divini Remix) 3) Plastic Boy vs System F - Cry (Bryan Kearny Mash Up) 4) Jon O’Bir Feat Julie Harrington - Enough (Original Mix) 5) Guy Mearns - String Theory (Original Mix) 6) Alpha Duo - The Unspoken (Original Mix) 7) PROYAL - Hankering (Original Mix) 8) Millaway - Silhouette (Brian Flinn Remix) 9) Brent Sadowick - Eye Opener (Original Mix) 10) Ian Booth - The Gold Rush (Original Mix) 11) Matthew Dunne - Punch (Original Mix) 12) Lola - Boot Down The Door (Original Mix)

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Progresiva - Episode 10
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
Progresiva is my 10th podcast!!!

Its all Progressive Trance with something a little different on the end….? Im afraid Im having a lazy week and havent compiled a tracklisting for you guys, but just enjoy the mix, its much tamer then my usual outputtings, the soundtrack for your day or warmup session

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Ibiza TwentyTen - Episode 9
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
I was doing a seperate podcast for house and trance but ahhh itunes made an epic failure with the feed so downloading was an impossibilty so i have merged the 2 podcasts back together for now, keeps the variety in my opinion!!! Anyways reflecting on my recent trip to the white isle that is Ibiza, i have a selection of tracks i heard whilst out there and i loved and a few randoms in for good measure!!

hope u like

1) Marco V - Feat Khashassi - Scenario (Daniel Portman Remix) |FranetiC Edit| 2) DjM Agebeat - greece 2010 3) michael woods - dynamik 4)Duck Sauce - Barbra Streisand (Original Mix) 5) Yeah Yeah Yeahs - Heads Will Roll (A-Trak Remix) 6) Baby D - Let Me Be Your Fantasy (Deadmau5_Remix) 7) Crazibiza - Spinning Around (Tommyboy Remix) 8) Funkagenda - Astana (Origi [...]
item.content:encoded:
I was doing a seperate podcast for house and trance but ahhh itunes made an epic failure with the feed so downloading was an impossibilty so i have merged the 2 podcasts back together for now, keeps the variety in my opinion!!! Anyways reflecting on my recent trip to the white isle that is Ibiza, i have a selection of tracks i heard whilst out there and i loved and a few randoms in for good measure!!

hope u like

1) Marco V - Feat Khashassi - Scenario (Daniel Portman Remix) |FranetiC Edit| 2) DjM Agebeat - greece 2010 3) michael woods - dynamik 4)Duck Sauce - Barbra Streisand (Original Mix) 5) Yeah Yeah Yeahs - Heads Will Roll (A-Trak Remix) 6) Baby D - Let Me Be Your Fantasy (Deadmau5_Remix) 7) Crazibiza - Spinning Around (Tommyboy Remix) 8) Funkagenda - Astana (Original Mix) 9)Roger Sanchez - 2gether Do It Yourself (Alex Armes & Scott Anselmo Remix) 10) Sagan - Above The Rim (Original Mix) 11) The Str8jackets ft. MC Chickaboo - Move & Rock (Keewix Remix) 12) Dero - Dero’s Rave (Original Mix)

xXx

item.title: FranetiC - Fractured Trance - Episode 8
item.dc:creator: franetic
item.description:
A fitting name for this one of my longer then my usual podcasts nearly @ 90mins, i got a little carried away in the mix ! anyway i chose the name as Ive broken my hand and i have a cast so thought i should name a podcast after it lol!! the podcast in my opinion goes brilliantly with the name in terms of choonage, a monster line up of tracks for your audio pleasure!!…… starts off uplifting, all the way through to techy trance with some filthy harder stuff at the end, all in all; a well and truly fractured trance mix! Tracklisting…..

1) TyDi feat. Audrey Gallagher - Calling (Original Mix) 2) Wezz Devall -This Is Your Day (Original Mix) 3) Matthew Dunne - Braced (Original Mix) 4) Sonic Element - Spirit of Time (Original Mix) 5) Roger Shah & Signum - Ancient World [...]
item.content:encoded:
A fitting name for this one of my longer then my usual podcasts nearly @ 90mins, i got a little carried away in the mix ! anyway i chose the name as Ive broken my hand and i have a cast so thought i should name a podcast after it lol!! the podcast in my opinion goes brilliantly with the name in terms of choonage, a monster line up of tracks for your audio pleasure!!…… starts off uplifting, all the way through to techy trance with some filthy harder stuff at the end, all in all; a well and truly fractured trance mix! Tracklisting…..

1) TyDi feat. Audrey Gallagher - Calling (Original Mix) 2) Wezz Devall -This Is Your Day (Original Mix) 3) Matthew Dunne - Braced (Original Mix) 4) Sonic Element - Spirit of Time (Original Mix) 5) Roger Shah & Signum - Ancient World (Signum Club Mix) 6) Phillip Alpha - Valente (Original Mix) 7) Giuseppe Ottaviani - Lightwaves (Original Mix) 8) Gareth Emery feat. Lucy Saunders - Sanctuary (Sean Tyas Remix) 9) JFK - Good God (2010 Mix) 10) Louk - Happy Days (DJ Choose & Fredin Mix) 11) Steve Allen & Nicky P -Generate (Original Mix) 12) Hypnotic Head - Tribal Nice (Mac & Taylor Mix) 13) Joe-E - Your Love (Original Mix) 14) Kidd Kaos & Mike Steventon - MK1 (Original Mix) 15) Pacific Link - Play Life (Play The Bass Mix)

Enjoy xXx

item.title: Episode 7 - FranetiC - Trance Invasion

item.description:
Sorry for the delay on this one…… I was awaiting my new decks, which finally arrived!!! this one is a journey from light to dark, with some dark techy elements and uplifting tracks all mish mashed in…… :D xXx

Tracklisting: -

item.content:encoded:
Sorry for the delay on this one…… I was awaiting my new decks, which finally arrived!!! this one is a journey from light to dark, with some dark techy elements and uplifting tracks all mish mashed in…… :D xXx

Tracklisting: -
